CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 4, 1945, pg. 28, reads: "First and Third, Together - Anthony and Dennis Farrell, sons of Pfc. John B. Farrell, now serving in Italy, were feted Thursday, July 26, at a birthday party given by their mother, Mrs. Freida Farrell. Having fun with the honored guests were Melvin Roberts Jr., Claudine Lorraine and Harold Wright Jr., Marie and Sherman Watson Jr., Tippie Charley, Howard Sheppard, Rita Howell, Nancy Woods, Elnora Detrick, Cynthia Cato, Mary Lou Nelson, Glen Hurt Jr., Patsy and Gail White, and several others not shown in picture. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Birthday party for Anthony and Dennis Farrell, surrounded by Melvin Roberts Jr., Claudine Lorraine and Harold Wright Jr., Marie and Sherman Watson Jr., Tippie Charley, Howard Sheppard, Rita Howell, Nancy Woods, Elnora Detrick, Cynthia Cato, Mary Lou Nelson, Glen Hurt Jr., Patsy White, and Gail White, at table with two birthday cakes in Farrell home
